pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, April 26, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, April 26, 2018:

Ottawa, Ontario

11 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable with the Gender Equality Advisory Council as part of the Gender Equality and Women’s Empowerment Summit.

Quebec Suite
Fairmont Chateau Laurier Hotel

Notes for media:

  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 10:30 a.m.
  • For any questions, please contact Jessica Séguin (G72018_media@international.ca)

2 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks and moderate a panel discussion as part of the Advancing Gender Equality and Women’s Empowerment Summit.

Adam Room
Fairmont Chateau Laurier Hotel

Notes for media:

  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 1:30 p.m. and proceed to the Adam Room.
  • For any questions, please contact Jessica Séguin (G72018_media@international.ca)
